verses.1: Sangpen paʼ liahna sung, Vanglian paʼ liim sungah a om mi khempeuh in
verses.2: Topaʼ tungah, “Ka bukna le ka munkip muanhuai, ka muan ka Pasian na hi hi,” ci ding uh hi.
verses.3: Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in thangsiah paʼ thangzak le a lauhuai pulnatna panin nang hong hon khia ding hi.
verses.4: Amah in a khate tawh nang hong tuam dinga, ama khateʼ nuai ah bukna ding na mu ding hi. Ama thumanna in nang hong dalin hong hu ding hi.
verses.5: Nangmah in zan a lauhuaina, sun-a thaltang leengte, khuamial lakah a vak khiankhian pulnatna, sun nitaang a suksiatnate na kihta kei ding hi.
verses.7: Na kiangah mi tul khat, na kimkot ah mi tul sawm, hong tukin a sih hangin bangmah na ci kei ding hi.
verses.8: Na mit tawh na en bek dinga, migilote a kithukkikna na mu ding hi.
verses.9: Nangmah in Topa pen na buk nadingin bawlin, Sangpen pa, nang a hong hu dingin bawl khin na hih manin
verses.10: nangma tungah siatna hong tung lo dinga, na inn sungah gimna hong tung lo ding hi.
verses.11: Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah a hong cing dingin amah in ama vantungmi nang hong kemsak ding hi.
verses.12: Na khete le suang a kitah khak loh nadingin amaute in a khut uh tawh nang hong dom ding uh hi.
verses.13: Nangmah in humpinelkai le gul gunei tung na tawn dinga, na khe nuai ah humpinelkai khanglai le gulpi na tuancil ding hi.
verses.14: Itna tawh hong bel ahih manin amah ka hon khia dinga, ka min hong thei ahih manin mun sangna ah amah ka koih ding hi.
verses.15: Amah in hong sap ciangin amah ka dawng ding hi. Haksatna sungah amah ka ompih dinga, amah hon khia-in ka pahtawi ding hi.
verses.16: Nuntak sau tawh amah ka lungkimsak dinga, amah ka hon khia ding hi.
